EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2016-06-22-Bates Education Webinar.EMAIL-Confirmation Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You For Registering For The VMTurbo Webinar Series - How Bates College Delivers Quality IT Services Campus-wide
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Hi {{Lead.First Name}}, You are now registered for our upcoming VMTurbo Webinar Series: How Bates College Delivers Quality IT Services Campus-wide! Date: Wednesday, June 22, 2016 Time: 1:00 - 2:00 PM EST - {{my.Bates & VMTurbo Webinar:default=Add To Calendar}} You should receieve a confirmation email from GoToWebinar shortly with your login information. See you there! - The VMTurbo Team
